Sentencas: Gasification of pelletised fuel cane bagasse a waste residue from an energy crop known as fuel cane was investigated to evaluate the potential of fuelling solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) with the raw fuel gas produced.
Titulo: Occurrence, composition and dew point of tars produced during gasification of fuel cane bagasse in a downdraft gasifier

Sentencas: Tars produced during gasification of the bagasse in a 50 kWe air-blown downdraft autothermal gasifier were collected, quantified and characterised and the tar dew point evaluated.
Titulo: Occurrence, composition and dew point of tars produced during gasification of fuel cane bagasse in a downdraft gasifier

Sentencas: The concentration of tar collected was 376 +/- 27 mg m(-3) of dry syngas (at 273 K, 101 kPa), emphasising the efficiency of the tar cracking reactions in the oxidation zone of the gasifier.
Titulo: Occurrence, composition and dew point of tars produced during gasification of fuel cane bagasse in a downdraft gasifier

Sentencas: However, although tar production was low, the typical mixture of tar compounds produced exhibited a high tar dew point of 90 +/- 5 degrees C and was dominated by Class 2 and 5 tars which condense readily even at low concentrations.
Titulo: Occurrence, composition and dew point of tars produced during gasification of fuel cane bagasse in a downdraft gasifier

Sentencas: Additionally Class 1 tars had a mass fraction of 8% of the total tar produced.
Titulo: Occurrence, composition and dew point of tars produced during gasification of fuel cane bagasse in a downdraft gasifier

Sentencas: Therefore the calculated tar dew point underestimates the actual tar dew point and a high potential for fouling of SOFC anodes exists.
Titulo: Occurrence, composition and dew point of tars produced during gasification of fuel cane bagasse in a downdraft gasifier

Sentencas: Consequently primary or secondary gas cleaning treatment measures targeting the production or occurrence of Class 1, 2 and 5 tars will be essential for long term operation of SOFC power generating systems fuelled by raw fuel gas from fuel cane bagasse.
Titulo: Occurrence, composition and dew point of tars produced during gasification of fuel cane bagasse in a downdraft gasifier
